block.p: MILLER-Milton, of Boca Raton and New York, died peacefully July 11th. Recipient of the Distinguished Flying Cross in China theater in WWII. Past president of the 14th Air Force Association and founder and editor of the Jing Bao journal. Beloved husband of Faye, devoted father of Larry and Terry, loving grandfather. Services at Riverside 76th Street, Thursday, July 13th at 1pm.
